name: Find the Harf
description:
Learn the Arabic alphabet, with proper pronunciation (makhaarij) for tajweed in an interactive medium! Includes audio and visual hints to guide players to the correct letter.

Find the Harf is safe for kids. We believe in making games that are a safe digital environment for kids. Our apps don't have any ads, in-app purchases, social media integration, or links outside the app. Our apps don't collect any personal data or require any special permissions to run.
